    AggregateFunction, ScalarFunction
    All Known Implementing Classes:

      • isPure

        boolean isPure()
        Checks whether the function is a pure function (as in doesn't depend on, nor produce side effects) or not.
        Returns:
        true if the function is a pure function, false otherwise.

      • isNative

        boolean isNative()
        Checks whether the function is a native/hard coded one or not.
        Returns:
        true if the function is a native/hard coded one, false otherwise.
